sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuItem } from 'primeng/api'; interface item { name: string, icon: string } @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { items: MenuItem[] | undefined; menuItems: item[] = [ { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: 'home', icon: 'pi pi-home' }, { name: '', icon: '' }, { name: '', icon: '' }, { name: '', icon: '' }, { name: '', icon: '' }, { name: '', icon: '' }, ] ngOnInit(): void { this.items = [ { label: 'Options', items: [ { label: 'Refresh', icon: 'pi pi-refresh' }, { label: 'Export', icon: 'pi pi-upload' } ] } ]; } }
